abstract: Kim Nam-Il (Korean: 김남일; born 14 March 1977) is a South Korean footballer. Kim is a defensive midfielder who currently plays for Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors. He was virtually unknown before he became a superstar for his impressive defensive displays in the 2002 FIFA World Cup.
